title: You Mean More to Me
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You mean more to me
Than words can ever say
Just to hold your hand and to know
Our love will stay
Feels so right you're in my arms
My love, tonight
[Chorus]
Oh you, you mean more to me than any love
I've ever known
And I want to give you all my love
Just you alone
[Bridge]
Oh, you're all my dreams come true
There's so much joy in your eyes
And all the love you give
You've finally made me realize
You're all I need
[Outro]
Oh, you, you mean more to me
Than words can ever say
